pkgmetadata.longdescription: Graph Prediction from a Graph Time Series // Predicting the structure of a graph including new nodes and edges using a time series of graphs. Flux balance analysis, a linear and integer programming technique used in biochemistry is used with time series prediction methods to predict the graph structure at a future time point Kandanaarachchi (2025) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2507.05806.
